title: ACCOUNTANCY
utme_requirements: YABATECH requires five (5) O Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two subjects from the followings: Principle of Account/Financial Accounting, Government/Civic Education, Commerce, Business Methods, Biology/Agric. Science, Geography and Literature in English.
subjects: YABATECH requires English Language, Mathematics, Economics and Principle of Account/Government/Commerce.

title: AGRICULTURAL & BIO-ENVIRONMENTAL  ENGINEERING/TECH
utme_requirements: YABATECH requires five (5) O’Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any other subject from the followings: Biology/Agric. Science, Economics, Geography, Technical Drawing and Agric. Mechanics.
subjects: YABATECH requires English Language, Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: AGRICULTURAL TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements: YABATECH requires five (5) O Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology/Agric. Science, Chemistry and any other subject from the followings: Physics, Economics, Geography, Food & Nutrition, Civic Education and Animal Husbandry/Fisheries.
subjects: YABATECH requires English Language, Biology/Agric. Science, Chemistry and Mathematics/Physics/Economics.

title: ARCHITECTURAL TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements: YABATECH requires five (5) O Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any other two subjects from the followings: Chemistry, Biology, Economics/Commerce, Geography, Technical Drawing, Further Mathematics and Fine Art.
subjects: YABATECH requires English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any other subject from: Chemistry, Economics, Technical Drawing, Fine Art and Geography.

title: ART & DESIGN
utme_requirements: YABATECH requires: Five O'Level Credit passes  which must include English Language, Mathematics, Fine Art/Visual Art/Technical Drawing/Building Engineering Drawing/Intro To Building Construction/Graphics/Painting & Decoration and any other two subjects from the following: Chemistry, Physics, History/Government, Biology/Agric. Science, Literature in English, Economics/Commerce, CR.K./I.R.K., Geography, Information & Communication Technology, Clothing & Textile/Embroidery and Wood Work
subjects: YABATECH requires: English Language, Fine Art/Visual Art/Technical Drawing and any other two subjects

title: BANKING & FINANCE
utme_requirements: YABATECH requires five (5) O’Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any other three subjects from the followings: Economics, Financial Accounting/Book Keeping, Geography, Statistics, Government/History, Commerce, Business Methods, Biology/Agric. Science and Insurance.
subjects: YABATECH requires English Language, Mathematics, Economics and Commerce.

title: BUILDING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements: YABATECH requires five (5) O’Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics and any other subject from the followings:, Biology, Agric. Science, Economics, Geography, Technical Drawing
subjects: YABATECH requires English Language, Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry/Fine Art.

title: BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION & MANAGEMENT
utme_requirements: YABATECH requires five (5) O’Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two subjects from the followings: Financial Accounting/Book Keeping, Commerce, Geography, Literature in English, Government/History, Biology/Agric. Science/Chemistry/Physics/Food & Nutrition and Civic Education
subjects:
YABATECH requires English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other subject from the followings:

 Financial Accounting, Book Keeping, Commerce, Geography, Literature in English, Government, History, Biology, Agric. Science/Chemistry, Physics, Food & Nutrition and Civic Education.

title: CHEMICAL ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY

subjects: YABATECH requires English Language, Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

subjects: YABATECH requires English Language, Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: ESTATE MANAGEMENT & VALUATION

Science and any one of the followings: Basic Surveying, Geography, Technical Drawing/Fine Art, Literature in English, Metal Work and Principles of Accounts.
